medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The first presentation of multicystic dysplastic kidney in this syndrome is reported. Specific details on onset and progression, including duration, intensity, and changes over time, were not provided.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Family with a novel heterozygous 10-bp deletion in exon 2 of the PAX2 gene leading to variable phenotype. Affected members exhibit various renal anomalies including renal hypoplasia and vesicoureteric reflux.
medical_history.family_history: A family with renal coloboma syndrome across three generations, with multiple affected members showing variable clinical phenotypes, including MCDK, suggestive of hereditary transmission.
